channel.title: CVE Feed for Devolutions -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Devolutions -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5765|2023-11-01T17:12:15.912Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Improper access control in the password analyzer feature in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2023.2.33 and earlier on Windows allows an attacker to bypass permissions via data source switching.

item.title: CVE-2023-5358|2023-11-01T17:18:14.337Z -- devolutions -- devolutions%20server
item.description: Improper access control in Report log filters feature in Devolutions Server 2023.2.10.0 and earlier allows attackers to retrieve logs from vaults or entries they are not allowed to access via the report request url query parameters.

item.title: CVE-2023-5575|2023-10-16T13:29:57.988Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Improper access control in the permission inheritance in Devolutions Server 2022.3.13.0 and earlier allows an attacker that compromised a low privileged user to access entries via a specific combination of permissions in the entry and in its parent.

item.title: CVE-2023-5240|2023-10-13T12:22:23.816Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Improper access control in PAM propagation scripts in Devolutions Server 2023.2.8.0 and ealier allows an attack with permission to manage PAM propagation scripts to retrieve passwords stored in it via a GET request.

item.title: CVE-2023-5766|2023-11-01T17:08:03.162Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in Remote Desktop Manager 2023.2.33 and earlier on Windows allows an attacker to remotely execute code from another windows user session on the same host via a specially crafted TCP packet.

item.title: CVE-2023-1603|2023-04-02T18:49:20.069507Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description:
Permission bypass when importing or synchronizing entries in User vault
in Devolutions Server 2022.3.13 and prior versions allows users with restricted rights to bypass entry permission via id collision.

item.title: CVE-2023-1202|2023-04-02T18:49:20.069507Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description:
Permission bypass when importing or synchronizing entries in User vault
in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2023.1.9 and prior versions allows users with restricted rights to bypass entry permission via id collision.

item.title: CVE-2023-1203|2023-03-10T20:05:13.704141Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager%20powershell%20module
item.description: Improper removal of sensitive data in the entry edit feature of Hub Business submodule in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager PowerShell Module 2022.3.1.5 and earlier allows an authenticated user to access sensitive data on entries that were edited using the affected submodule.

item.title: CVE-2023-1980|2023-04-24T13:13:29.808Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description:
Two factor
authentication
bypass on login in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2022.3.35 and earlier allow user to cancel the two factor authentication via the application user interface and open entries.

item.title: CVE-2023-1580|2023-04-02T18:49:20.069507Z -- devolutions -- gateway
item.description: Uncontrolled resource consumption in the logging feature in Devolutions Gateway 2023.1.1 and earlier allows an attacker to cause a denial of service by filling up the disk and render the system unusable.

item.title: CVE-2023-1201|2023-03-10T20:05:13.704141Z -- devolutions -- devolutions%20server
item.description: Improper access control in the secure messages feature in Devolutions Server 2022.3.12 and below allows an authenticated attacker that possesses the message UUID to access the data it contains.

item.title: CVE-2023-1939|2023-04-11T17:47:49.976Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description:
No access control for the OTP key
on OTP entries
in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager Windows 2022.3.33.0 and prior versions and Remote Desktop Manager Linux 2022.3.2.0 and prior versions allows non admin users to see OTP keys via the user interface.

item.title: CVE-2023-1574|2023-04-02T18:49:20.069507Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Information disclosure in the user creation feature of a MSSQL data source in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2023.1.9 and below on Windows allows an attacker with access to the user interface to obtain sensitive information via the error message dialog that displays the password in clear text.

item.title: CVE-2023-0463|2023-01-26T06:03:10.975661Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: The force offline MFA prompt setting is not respected when switching to offline mode in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2022.3.29 to 2022.3.30 allows a user to save sensitive data on disk.

item.title: CVE-2023-0951|2023-03-01T05:45:13.020935Z -- devolutions -- devolutions%20server
item.description: Improper access controls on some API endpoints in Devolutions Server 2022.3.12 and earlier could allow a standard privileged user to perform privileged actions.

item.title: CVE-2023-0952|2023-03-01T05:45:13.020935Z -- devolutions -- devolutions%20server
item.description: Improper access controls on entries in Devolutions Server 2022.3.12 and earlier could allow an authenticated user to access sensitive data without proper authorization.

item.title: CVE-2023-0661|2023-02-12T01:45:42.615671Z -- devolutions -- devolutions%20server
item.description: Improper access control in Devolutions Server allows an authenticated user to access unauthorized sensitive data.

item.title: CVE-2023-0953|2023-03-01T05:45:13.020935Z -- devolutions -- devolutions%20server
item.description: Insufficient input sanitization in the documentation feature of Devolutions Server 2022.3.12 and earlier allows an authenticated attacker to perform an SQL Injection, potentially resulting in unauthorized access to system resources.

item.title: CVE-2023-4417|2023-08-22T16:40:48.922Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Improper access controls in the entry duplication component in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2023.2.19 and earlier versions on Windows allows an authenticated user, under specific circumstances, to inadvertently share their personal vault entry with shared vaults via an incorrect vault in the duplication write process.

item.title: CVE-2023-4373|2023-08-21T18:36:23.305Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Inadequate validation of permissions when employing remote tools and macros within Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager versions 2023.2.19 and earlier permits a user to initiate a connection without proper execution rights via the remote tools feature.

item.title: CVE-2023-7047|2023-12-21T14:45:18.661Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Inadequate validation of permissions when employing remote tools and macros via the context menu within Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager versions 2023.3.31 and earlier permits a user to initiate a connection without proper execution rights via the remote tools feature. This affects only SQL data sources.

item.title: CVE-2023-6288|2023-12-06T13:49:50.204Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Code injection in Remote Desktop Manager 2023.3.9.3 and earlier on macOS allows an attacker to execute code via the DYLIB_INSERT_LIBRARIES environment variable.

item.title: CVE-2023-6588|2023-12-07T15:59:19.821Z -- devolutions -- workspace
item.description: Offline mode is always enabled, even if permission disallows it, in Devolutions Server data source in Devolutions Workspace 2023.3.2.0 and earlier. This allows an attacker with access to the Workspace application to access credentials when offline.

item.title: CVE-2023-6593|2023-12-12T14:32:56.806Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Client side permission bypass in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2023.3.4.0 and earlier on iOS allows an attacker that has access to the application to execute entries in a SQL data source without restriction.

item.title: CVE-2023-6264|2023-11-22T18:39:21.629Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Information leak in Content-Security-Policy header in Devolutions Server 2023.3.7.0 allows an unauthenticated attacker to list the configured Devolutions Gateways endpoints.

item.title: CVE-2023-2445|2023-05-02T13:11:06.405Z -- devolutions -- devolutions%20server
item.description: Improper access control in Subscriptions Folder path filter in Devolutions Server 2023.1.1 and earlier allows attackers with administrator privileges to retrieve usage information on folders in user vaults via a specific folder name.

item.title: CVE-2023-2400|2023-06-20T16:19:50.629Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Improper deletion of resource in the user management feature in Devolutions Server 2023.1.8 and earlier allows an administrator to view users vaults of deleted users via database access.

item.title: CVE-2023-2118|2023-06-12T19:48:35.982Z -- devolutions -- devolutions%20server
item.description: Insufficient access control in support ticket feature in Devolutions Server 2023.1.5.0 and below allows an authenticated attacker to send support tickets and download diagnostic files via specific endpoints.

item.title: CVE-2023-2282|2023-04-25T18:23:00.287Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Improper access control in the Web Login listener in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2023.1.22 and earlier on Windows allows an authenticated user to bypass administrator-enforced Web Login restrictions and gain access to entries via an unexpected vector.

item.title: CVE-2023-2257|2023-04-24T18:48:52.039Z -- devolutions -- workspace%20desktop
item.description:
Authentication Bypass in Hub Business integration in Devolutions Workspace Desktop 2023.1.1.3 and earlier on Windows and macOS allows an attacker with access to the user interface to unlock a Hub Business space without being prompted to enter the password via an unimplemented "Force Login" security feature.
This vulnerability occurs only if "Force Login" feature is enabled on the Hub Business instance and that an attacker has access to a locked Workspace desktop application configured with a Hub Business space.

item.title: CVE-2024-5072|2024-06-04T18:02:03.478Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Improper input validation in PAM JIT elevation feature in Devolutions Server 2024.1.11.0 and earlier allows an authenticated user with access to the PAM JIT elevation feature to manipulate the LDAP filter query via a specially crafted request.

item.title: CVE-2024-1901|2024-06-04T18:01:30.078Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Denial of service in PAM password rotation during the check-in process in Devolutions Server 2023.3.14.0 allows an authenticated user with specific PAM permissions to make PAM credentials unavailable.

item.title: CVE-2024-1900|2024-06-04T18:01:10.663Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description:
Improper session management in the identity provider authentication flow in Devolutions Server 2023.3.14.0 and earlier allows an authenticated user via an identity provider to stay authenticated after his user is disabled or deleted in the identity provider such as Okta or Microsoft O365.
The user will stay authenticated until the Devolutions Server token expiration.

item.title: CVE-2024-1898|2024-06-04T17:59:54.740Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Improper access control in the notification feature in Devolutions Server 2023.3.14.0 and earlier allows a low privileged user to change notifications settings configured by an administrator.

item.title: CVE-2024-1764|2024-03-05T21:35:52.233Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Improper privilege management in Just-in-time (JIT) elevation module in Devolutions Server 2023.3.14.0 and earlier allows a user to continue using the elevated privilege even after the expiration under specific circumstances

item.title: CVE-2024-0589|2024-01-31T13:04:51.170Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the entry overview tab in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2023.3.36 and earlier on Windows allows an attacker with access to a data source to inject a malicious script via a specially crafted input in an entry.

item.title: CVE-2024-3545|2024-06-04T17:31:25.717Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Improper permission handling in the vault offline cache feature in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2024.1.20 and earlier on windows and Devolutions Server 2024.1.8 and earlier allows an attacker to access sensitive informations contained in the offline cache file by gaining access to a computer where the software is installed even though the offline mode is disabled.

item.title: CVE-2024-2403|2024-06-04T17:30:52.538Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Improper cleanup in temporary file handling component in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2024.1.12 and earlier on Windows allows an attacker that compromised a user endpoint, under specific circumstances, to access sensitive information via residual files in the temporary directory.

item.title: CVE-2024-2921|2024-06-04T17:30:24.175Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Improper access control in PAM vault permissions in Devolutions Server 2024.1.10.0 and earlier allows an authenticated user with access to the PAM to access unauthorized PAM entries via a specific set of permissions.

item.title: CVE-2024-2915|2024-03-26T15:51:02.451Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Improper access control in PAM JIT elevation in Devolutions Server 2024.1.6 and earlier allows an attacker with access to the PAM JIT elevation feature to elevate themselves to unauthorized groups via a specially crafted request.

item.title: CVE-2024-2241|2024-06-04T17:29:42.790Z -- devolutions -- workspace
item.description: Improper access control in the user interface in Devolutions Workspace 2024.1.0 and earlier allows an authenticated user to perform unintended actions via specific permissions

item.title: CVE-2024-2918|2024-04-09T18:42:44.643Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Improper input validation in PAM JIT elevation feature in Devolutions Server 2024.1.6 and earlier allows an attacker with access to the PAM JIT elevation feature to forge the displayed group in the PAM JIT elevation checkout request via a specially crafted request.
